title: Perfect Strangers
lyrics:
Empathies fall one me
As the sun goes asleep far from home
In your eyes, I can see
All the secrets you keep letting go
Sip it down 'til we make it

When we dance with the flame, ya

Was all the worries away 'cause

All I know is we



Don't have to be perfect, perfect strangers

And now I have no worries, we won't be strangers

We're all coming from a different place

But these lights, they shining us the same

Don't have to be perfect, perfect strangers

Perfect strangers

(Don't have to be)



Think the sun, then we miss

And keep swimming finding the tide

I don't know where we'll go

But we got this moment tonight



Sip it down 'til we make it

When we dance with the flame, ya

Wash all worries away 'cause

All I know is we



Don't have to be perfect, perfect strangers

And now I have no worries, we won't be strangers

We're all coming from a different place

But these lights, they shining us the same

Don't have to be perfect, perfect strangers



Don't have to be perfect



Don't have to be

Perfect strangers

We won't be strangers

We're all coming from a different place

But these lights, they shining us the same

Don't have to be perfect, perfect strangers

Perfect strangers
